title-part.text: PROCESSES, APPARATUS OR SELECTION OF SUBSTANCES FOR IMPREGNATING, STAINING, DYEING, BLEACHING OF WOOD OR SIMILAR MATERIALS, OR TREATING OF WOOD OR SIMILAR MATERIALS WITH PERMEANT LIQUIDS, NOT OTHERWISE PROVIDED FOR

reference.text: applying liquids or other fluent materials to surfaces in general B05; coating wood or similar material B44D

title-part.text: CHEMICAL OR PHYSICAL TREATMENT OF CORK, CANE, REED, STRAW OR SIMILAR MATERIALS

note.note-paragraph: In this subclass non-limiting references (in the sense of paragraph 39 of the Guide to the IPC) may still be displayed in the scheme.

CPC-specific-text.text: e.g. impregnation pretreatment, for example puncturing; Wood impregnation aids not directly involved in the impregnation process

note.note-paragraph: In groups B27K3/16 - B27K3/50, the last place priority rule is applied, i.e. at each hierarchical level, in the absence of an indication to the contrary, impregnating agents are classified in the last appropriate place.This Note corresponds to IPC Note (1) relating to B27K3/16 - B27K3/34.

CPC-specific-text.text: Stationary devices on or in legs or poles
using rods or tablets, or ampoules, e.g. inserted in pre-drilled cavities
involving an additional treatment during or after impregnation
for improving the penetration of the impregnating fluid
along the fibers, i.e. longitudinal impregnation
using supercritical or high pressure fluids

title-part.text: Impregnating by coating the surface of the wood with an impregnating paste

CPC-specific-text.text: including use of polymer-containing impregnating agents

reference.text: macromolecular compounds derived from lignocellulosic materials C08H; compositions of lignin-containing materials C08L97/02

note.note-paragraph: When classifying in group B27K3/15, classification is additionally made in the groups of subclass C08L for defining the chemical polymeric structure

CPC-specific-text.text: Without in-situ polymerisation, condensation, or cross-linking reactions
Combined with grafting onto wood fibres

title-part.text: Compounds of alkali metals or ammonium
Compounds of iron, aluminium, or chromium
Mixtures of different inorganic impregnating agents

reference.text: B27K3/156 takes precedence; macromolecular compounds derived from lignocellulosic materials C08H

title-part.text: Mixtures of different organic impregnating agents
Impregnating agents containing mixtures of inorganic and organic compounds
Treating of wood not provided for in groups B27K1/00, B27K3/00

CPC-specific-text.text: by using electromagnetic radiation or mechanical waves
Thermal treatments, i.e. involving chemical modification of wood at temperatures well over 100°C

title-part.text: Combined bleaching or impregnating and drying of wood
Chemical or physical treatment of cork
Chemical or physical treatment of reed, straw, or similar material

reference.text: mechanical working of cane or the like B27J1/00

title-part.text: Articles made of particles or fibres consisting of wood or other lignocellulosic material

reference.text: wood composite materials made of particles or fibres B27N

title-part.text: Extraction of components naturally occurring in wood, cork, straw, cane or reed

reference.text: biocidal compositions A01N; sterilization or disinfection of wood A61L
